186036033.review:
It's not The Complete Saga and it only parodies the first two seasons of the show, but it's still a good time with LEGO's signature slapstick humor. The base battle mode was also fun and I played the absolute living HELL out of those as a kid.
Pick this up. I cannot stress this enough. PICK. THIS. UP!

185850262.review: Uninspired and boring level design, I have never seen so many copy and paste areas n a lego game before. Furthermore 5 of the 6  Ifirst levels are wasteland areas with only desert and rocks despite not all of those levels being on Geonosis. The combat moves are more fluid than the predecessors but that's the only positive thing I can say so far.

185462501.review:
Having played the Complete Saga & Skywalker Saga, I expected the same level of quality that those two had.

While I much prefer Complete Saga due to its level-focused missions being more fun, I still recognize Skywalker Saga as a fun game.

This is not a fun game.

This game doesn't even feel like a sequel to the Complete Saga. While I can see the mechanical and graphical improvemments, there is so much fun taken away its insane. I had to look up guides so many times to progress in a level because I had no clue where to go!

Don't play this. Just stick to the Complete Saga and leave your Lego Star Wars experience there.

183959203.review:
Pros:
+ Most Story Levels are based off of Episodes of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV Series
+ Fantastic Soundtrack
+ Lots of Characters to unlock
+ Cool Vehicles
+ Minikit Characters and Space Missions are a great addition
+ Bounty Hunter Missions makes a return in this game
+ Great on Steam Deck

Cons:
- Savage Oppress is only unlocked by putting in a Cheat Code
- Some Republic/Separatist Assault Missions are hard
- Collecting Minikits and Red Bricks is repetitive
- Quick Time Events are present during the final section of Duel of the Droids
- Darkness sections are abysmal

183943683.review: only problem was it gets really dark on like 2 levels so its really not that serious lol

183925123.review: childhood classic, the nostalgia is unmatched

183849859.review:
Great Lego game.

183605103.review: Achei o jogo muito bom para uma guerra. Eu queria muito jogar esse jogo, mas, muitas pessoas falando mau dele pela internet, quando finalmente consegui joga- lo achei ele realmente com coisas ruins: fases muito parecidas, corredores (realmente) grandes e boses meio ruins. Mas, só estou começando a joga- lo. Mesmo com coisas ruins eu acho o jogo incrível com uma fórmula diferente e repetitiva para os jogos da LEGO. Eu sendo como um fã dos jogos e brinquedos dessa franquia me surpreendi. Recomendo este jogo para quem gosta de guerras (nos jogos) e de pessoas que gostam de Super Mario RPG e Crash Royale (jogos que nunca joguei, mas já vi a estética.

183512010.review:
